dct_description_sm: California shown as large island on double hemisphere map (center page). ...Another issue, 1710.

Dedication: To the Rt. Hon.ble George Berkeley Ld. Berkeley, Manbray, Segrave, & Bruce, Baron of Berkeley Castle, & Earle of Berkeley, & one of the Lords of his Majestyes most Hon.ble Privi Councell &c. Anno Dom 1678. This Plate is humb.ly Dedicated By Ric.d Blome. (upper left). Coat of arms (upper right).
From: Gentleman's recreation, London, 1686, Geography section, p.104.

Description of "Geography is either..." surrounds the world map, and this has a pictorial and descriptive oval border of "The Earth is divided into Realmes" -- "Realmes into Provinces" -- "Provinces into Regions"
